src:
Joana Diniz muda radicalmente de visual
07 Nov 2019, 15:30 by A Televisão

A ex-concorrente da ‘Casa dos Segredos’ anunciou nas redes sociais a sua mais recente mudança de visual.

Através de um vídeo, Joana Diniz disse adeus ao cabelo curto e mostra as extensões que a deixaram com um longo cabelo.
“Apesar de gostar muito de me ver de cabelo curto, voltei ao cabelo comprido”, disse Joana, ao mostrar o antes e depois desta mudança radical.

text:
Joana Diniz radically changes her look
07 Nov 2019, 15:30 by The Television

The former competitor of 'House of Secrets' has announced on social networks her latest change of look.

Through a video, Joana Diniz said goodbye to her short hair and shows the extensions that left her with long hair.
“Although I really enjoyed seeing myself with short hair, I went back to long hair,” Joana said, showing the before and after this radical change.
